sections.title: Bloodrager Bloodlines: Can a bloodrager use abilities that require sorcerer levels and relate to sorcerer bloodlines likerobe of arcane heritage?
sections.anchor_heading: ## Bloodrager Bloodlines: Can a bloodrager use abilities that require sorcerer levels and relate to sorcerer bloodlines likerobe of arcane heritage?
sections.description: No. Some hybrid classes, like the brawler, have a class feature allowing them to use items related to their parent class, but the bloodrager doesn’t.

sections.title: Dragon Disciple and Bloodrager: The dragon disciple’s blood of dragons ability increases draconic sorcerer bloodline powers. What about draconic bloodragers?
sections.anchor_heading: ## Dragon Disciple and Bloodrager: The dragon disciple’s blood of dragons ability increases draconic sorcerer bloodline powers. What about draconic bloodragers?
sections.description: Yes, dragon disciple's blood of dragons ability should also increase draconic bloodragers’ bloodline powers.

sections.title: Investigators and Spell Trigger: Investigators’ alchemy class feature is missing a sentence that appears in the alchemist allowing him to use spell trigger items. Does that mean the investigator can’t use spell trigger items?
sections.anchor_heading: ## Investigators and Spell Trigger: Investigators’ alchemy class feature is missing a sentence that appears in the alchemist allowing him to use spell trigger items. Does that mean the investigator can’t use spell trigger items?
sections.description: Investigators cannot use spell trigger items. The omitted sentence was intentional.

sections.title: Pack Flanking: Is Pack Flanking a combat feat?
sections.anchor_heading: ## Pack Flanking: Is Pack Flanking a combat feat?
sections.description: Yes, Pack Flanking should be a combat feat. This change will be reflected in the next errata.

sections.title: Spirit Guide Oracle: What happens if a spirit guide oracle gains the arcane enlightenment hex, which adds spells “to the list of shaman spells she can prepare?”
sections.anchor_heading: ## Spirit Guide Oracle: What happens if a spirit guide oracle gains the arcane enlightenment hex, which adds spells “to the list of shaman spells she can prepare?”
sections.description: An oracle doesn’t prepare spells, so that particular hex isn’t useful for her.

sections.title: Steadfast Personality: In the current version (2nd printing errata), the table and the text are inconsistent. Does the feat apply on all Will saves, or on Will saves against mind-affecting effects?
sections.anchor_heading: ## Steadfast Personality: In the current version (2nd printing errata), the table and the text are inconsistent. Does the feat apply on all Will saves, or on Will saves against mind-affecting effects?
sections.description: The table is correct. It only applies against mind-affecting effects.

sections.title: The slayer’s favored target advancement doesn’t mention that the skill bonuses increase from +1 at levels 5, 10, 15, and 20. Should they increase?
sections.anchor_heading: ## The slayer’s favored target advancement doesn’t mention that the skill bonuses increase from +1 at levels 5, 10, 15, and 20. Should they increase?
sections.description: Yes, they should increase along with slayer ability DCs, attack, and damage. This will be reflected in future errata.
